author: senh
title: Best U.S. Historic Hotels for 2015
text: BING NEWS: Best U.S. Historic Hotels for 2015 (CNN)When guests stay at the Jefferson in Washington, the Peabody Memphis or Michigan's Grand Hotel, they know they are supporting a hotel of historic significance.
